mapper.select: SELECT TD.NOMBRE_TIPODOCU||' NÂ° '||PE.NUMERO_EXP AS NUMERODOCU FROM PROY_EXPT PE, TIPOS_DOCUMENTOS TD WHERE PE.ID_TIPOSDOCUS=TD.ID_TIPOSDOCUS AND PE.ID_PROYECTO=#{codigo} AND TD.ID_TIPOSDOCUS=#{tipo} AND PE.NUMERO_EXP NOT IN ('0') GROUP BY TD.NOMBRE_TIPODOCU,PE.NUMERO_EXP ORDER BY PE.NUMERO_EXP
mapper.update: UPDATE EJECUCION SET MES=#{mes}, ANIO=#{anio}, EXPTECN_E=#{c1E}, INFRAEST_E=#{c2E}, EQUIPMOBIL_E=#{c3E}, SUPERV_E=#{c4E}, CAPACITAC_E=#{c5E}, OTROS_E=#{c6E}, EXPTECN_PRE=#{c1P},INFRAEST_PRE=#{c2P},EQUIPMOBIL_PRE=#{c3P},SUPERV_PRE=#{c4P},CAPACITAC_PRE=#{c5P},OTROS_PRE=#{c6P}, RORDR1=#{rordr1},RORDR2=#{rordr2},RORDR3=#{rordr3},RORDR4=#{rordr4},RORDR5=#{rordr5},RORDR6=#{rordr6} WHERE ID_EJECUCION=#{idEjecucion}
mapper.select: SELECT ID_PROYECTO AS IDEXP FROM PROYECTO WHERE ID_PROYECTO=#{codigo}
SELECT ID_PROYECTO AS IDEXP FROM PROYECTO WHERE ID_PROYECTO LIKE '%'||#{codigo}||'%'
SELECT ID_RORDR AS IDRORDR FROM RO_RDR WHERE NOMBRE=#{nombre}
SELECT PE.ETAPA AS ETAPA FROM PROY_EXPT PE WHERE PE.ID_PROYECTO=#{idproy} AND PE.ETAPA NOT IN ('0') GROUP BY PE.ETAPA ORDER BY PE.ETAPA ASC

SELECT E.ID_EJECUCION AS IDEJECUCION, E.MES AS MES, TO_CHAR(E.FECHA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS FECHA, E.ANIO AS ANIO, E.EXPTECN_E AS EXPE, E.INFRAEST_E AS INFAE, E.EQUIPMOBIL_E AS EQUIMOBE, E.SUPERV_E AS SUPERVE, E.CAPACITAC_E AS CAPACE, E.OTROS_E AS OTROSE, E.EXPTECN_PRE AS EXPPRE, E.INFRAEST_PRE AS INFRAPRE, E.EQUIPMOBIL_PRE AS EQUIMOBPRE, E.SUPERV_PRE AS SUPERPRE, E.CAPACITAC_PRE AS CAPAPRE, E.OTROS_PRE AS OTROSPRE, E.RORDR1 AS RO1, E.RORDR2 AS RO2, E.RORDR3 AS RO3, E.RORDR4 AS RO4, E.RORDR5 AS RO5, E.RORDR6 AS RO6 FROM EJECUCION E, PROY_EXPT PE WHERE E.ID_PROYEXPT=PE.ID_PROYEXPT AND PE.ID_PROYECTO=#{codigo} AND PE.ID_PROYEXPT IN (SELECT ID_PROYEXPT FROM PROY_EXPT WHERE ID_PROYECTO=#{codigo} AND ETAPA=#{etapa}) AND E.MES=#{mes} AND E.ANIO=#{anio}

SELECT PE.EXP_TECN AS EXP_TECN, PE.INFRAESTRUCTURA AS INFRAESTRUCTURA, PE.EQUIP_MOBIL AS EQUIP_MOBIL, PE.SUPERVISION AS SUPERVISION, PE.CAPACITACION AS CAPACITACION, PE.OTROS AS OTROS, PE.FECHA_REG AS FECHA_REG, PE.MONTO_MODIF AS MONTO_MODIF, PE.ID_TIPOSDOCUS AS TIPOSDOCUS, PE.ID_PROYECTO AS ID_PROYECTO, PE.NUMERO_MONTO AS NUM_MONTO, PE.ID_PROYEXPT AS PEXPTECN, PE.NUMERO_RR AS NUMRR, PE.NUMERO_EXP AS NUMEXP, PE.ETAPA AS ETAPA, PE.ESTADO AS ESTADO FROM PROY_EXPT PE WHERE PE.ID_PROYECTO=#{codigo} AND PE.ETAPA=#{etapa} AND PE.NUMERO_MONTO IN (SELECT MAX(PE2.NUMERO_MONTO) FROM PROY_EXPT PE2 WHERE PE2.ID_PROYECTO=#{codigo} AND PE2.ETAPA=#{etapa}) ORDER BY PE.NUMERO_MONTO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE PROY_EXPT SET ESTADO='1' WHERE NUMERO_MONTO NOT IN( SELECT MAX(NUMERO_MONTO) FROM PROY_EXPT WHERE ETAPA=#{etapa} AND ID_PROYECTO=#{proyecto}) AND ESTADO NOT IN ('0','1') AND ETAPA=#{etapa} AND ID_PROYECTO=#{proyecto}
mapper.select: SELECT PE.EXP_TECN AS EXP_TECN, PE.INFRAESTRUCTURA AS INFRAESTRUCTURA, PE.EQUIP_MOBIL AS EQUIP_MOBIL, PE.SUPERVISION AS SUPERVISION, PE.CAPACITACION AS CAPACITACION, PE.OTROS AS OTROS, PE.FECHA_REG AS FECHA_REG, PE.MONTO_MODIF AS MONTO_MODIF, PE.ID_TIPOSDOCUS AS TIPOSDOCUS, PE.ID_PROYECTO AS ID_PROYECTO, PE.NUMERO_MONTO AS NUM_MONTO, PE.ID_PROYEXPT AS PEXPTECN, PE.NUMERO_RR AS NUMRR, PE.NUMERO_EXP AS NUMEXP, PE.ETAPA AS ETAPA, PE.ESTADO AS ESTADO FROM PROY_EXPT PE WHERE PE.ID_PROYECTO=#{proyecto} AND PE.ETAPA='0' AND PE.NUMERO_MONTO='0'
select COUNT(ID_PROYEXPT) AS CANTIDAD FROM PROY_EXPT WHERE ID_PROYECTO=#{proyecto}
